short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension for overriding the guid of the megaphone podcast episode page you are on

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Have you ever wished that the GUID of your megaphone episode was the same GUID as one provided for an episode from a big platform that controls you like a puppetmaster? Well, Slate producers have! And now you can have too.
